sections.comments: Course is delivered entirely online via UBC Canvas.  To access the course module, go to www.canvas.ubc.ca   |  Note: students taking this course should book the rest of the afternoon for field work.The course will be following public health guidelines, and will not be meeting in UBC campus classrooms.  Opportunities to participate in individual projects (following BC public health guidelines) will be explored as part of the course.

description: Application of occupational hygiene principles using field investigations, critical appraisal of results, and communication with labour and management.
